name: One night at box and sticks
name_original: One night at box and sticks
description:
stick will call you and tell you how to play in the game.

the animatronics are haunted...

they have many different ability's...

they can make you hallucinate and make you believe that they are on the stage (when they are really not)  

METAL stick can move very stealthy...he makes no sound when moving...

METAL box is very loud with his movements....

GOLDEN KEVIN when he appears flip up your monitor until you hear a banging noise   

die (highly recommended)
